title: LENRUE Bluetooth Speaker, Mini Portable Speakers with LED Lights, Enhanced Bass, Built-in Mic, 5 Hour Playtime, Wireless Speaker for iPhone, iPad, Samsung, Laptops, Tablets, Car, Home (Rose Gold)
feature_list: 【Crystal Clear Sound】 The sound is bass and clear, enough to easily fill your bedroom with great music as you enjoy yourself. You can Just hear the wonderful music wherever you are. Relieve your irritability and anxiety during the flu.
【Incredible Battery Life】 1000mAh high capacity, 5 hour/ 60-song playtime powered by a built-in high capacity li-ion battery and industry-leading power MANAGEMENT technology.

【Ultra Portable Speaker】 Mini speaker is palm-size, sleek and delicate design with lightweight, it is convenient to put in pocket or backbag for travel, beach, party and other outdoor and indoor activities.

【Multiple Audio Input Mode】 The mini wireless speaker equipped with Bluetooth V4.1 technology, support Wireless Bluetooth (up to 33 feet ), TF Card insert and 3.5mm AUX-IN input for non-Bluetooth devices. Works with iPhone/ iOS/ Andriod/ Echo etc.
【Hands-free Function】 Built-in HD microphone for the wireless bluetooth speakers allow you to answer, reject and end calls conveniently without holding your smartphone.
